title: Why can't I line up League of Legends on my computer screen?
body: My League of Legends "screen" is too big for my computer screen. The bottom part gets cut off. I can't communicate with fellow players. What can I do?

replies.body: This can happen if you are on a 4K or exceeding a resolution higher than 1920x1080.  Reducing your resolution in this case or switching to fullscreen can help.  Let me know if that helps!

Thanks, but it turned out to be something else. Somehow, everything on my computer had become too big (don't ask me how, sometimes my cat stomps around on the keyboard and makes really weird changes to the whole system). Anyway, now the sizes have been reduced, and I can see everything. What a relief.
Haha, bad kitty!  Glad all is well now.
